name: Phoenix
description:
Phoenix is the first game in a series of four text adventures based on the continuing struggle between the "Time Crusaders of Chronos" and the "Abomination" and his evil minions.

The player takes the role of a man who was tortured and killed when the "Abomination" conquered his land. Rescued and recruited by the legendary "Champions of Chronos" to fight in the 'Great Temporal Struggle' you have already been reborn once when you fought in Dagda. Now, like a phoenix you're reborn once more, the war continues...

In this incarnation you fight the 'Abomination' in the village of Finvarra, Ireland, in a tale involving magic and druids.
